sentences.sContent: I mean, in spite of this commonsense explanation, we are going to see how to prove this.
sentences.sContent_eng: I mean, in spite of this commonsense explanation, we are going to see how to prove this.
sentences.sCn: 我的意思是，不管常识怎么解释的，我们都将看看如何证明这个定理。

sentences.sContent: If you now look at Hume's have to say about science, a lot of it will look like commonsense.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you now look at Hume's have to say about science, a lot of it will look like commonsense.
sentences.sCn: 如果你现在看看休谟关于自然科学所说的内容，里面的大部分看起来像是常识。

sentences.sContent: At the time it was very far from commonsense and it's a mark of how far we have come that we now accept the ultimate principles of science are ones that we cannot hope to base on pure reason.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the time it was very far from commonsense and it's a mark of how far we have come that we now accept the ultimate principles of science are ones that we cannot hope to base on pure reason.
sentences.sCn: 但是当那些内容远没有成为常识的时代,当我们如今已经接受的,自然科学和最终原理还未被采纳的时代,我们不能寄希望于纯粹的推理。

words.tran: 有基本常识的；明白事理的
